Package MazeGenerate

Class MinHeap

java.lang.Object
MazeGenerate.MinHeap
public class MinHeap extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    DecreaseKey(Node node, int new_value)
    DecreaseKey is a standard operation of minHeap (locate the node in the array, change its key value)
    Node
    ExtractMin()
    ExtractMin is a standard operation of a minHeap (check the child node (left first) smaller than current node --> bubble down)
    void
    Insert(Node node, int weight)
    Insert is a standard operation of a minHeap (check the parent nodes bigger than current node --> bubble up)
    boolean
    NotEmpty()
    NotEmpty is used to show if the minHeap is empty
    protected void
    swap(int a, int b)
    swap is used to swap two node and its respective weight value inside the minHeap using the hash array call a = 0 when remove smallest

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • Insert

      public void Insert(Node node, int weight)
      Insert is a standard operation of a minHeap (check the parent nodes bigger than current node --> bubble up)
      Parameters:
      node - The node coordinate (need to store in the minHeap together --> maze need the parent array and the coordinate to contruct the maze
      weight - The node's weight (In this case, it is randomly assume in MazeGenerate.MinimumSpanningTree)

    • ExtractMin

      public Node ExtractMin()
      ExtractMin is a standard operation of a minHeap (check the child node (left first) smaller than current node --> bubble down)
      Returns:
      The node with the minimum weight (just the coordinate)

    • DecreaseKey

      public void DecreaseKey(Node node, int new_value)
      DecreaseKey is a standard operation of minHeap (locate the node in the array, change its key value)
      Parameters:
      node - The node (coordinate) to be changed
      new_value - The new key value

    • NotEmpty

      public boolean NotEmpty()
      NotEmpty is used to show if the minHeap is empty
      Returns:
      true when minHeap is not empty

    • swap

      protected void swap(int a, int b)
      swap is used to swap two node and its respective weight value inside the minHeap using the hash array call a = 0 when remove smallest
      Parameters:
      a - First node index
      b - Second node index
